subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: All the teams and drivers agree: There is no other circuit on the Formula One calendar like the Autodromo Nazionale di Monza, site of the Italian Grand Prix this weekend in a suburb of Milan.
snippet: All the teams and drivers agree: There is no other circuit on the Formula One calendar like the Autodromo Nazionale di Monza, site of the Italian Grand Prix this weekend in a suburb of Milan.
